Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors will face the same Pelicans for a home rematch on Wednesday night, looking to build off the positive momentum from their 20-point comeback victory on Tuesday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Buddy Hield and Lindy Waters III combined for 49 points and 10 3-pointers in the Warriors' 124-106 comeback victory over the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday.
Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram combined for 61 points in the Pelicans' loss to the Warriors on Tuesday.
Others: Stephen Curry (left peroneal strain) and De'Anthony Melton (strained lower back) are OUT for the Warriors, while Dejounte Murray (Left Hand; Fracture), Trey Murphy (Right Hamstring; Strain), Herb Jones (Right Shoulder; Strain) and CJ McCollum (Right Adductor; Soreness) are OUT for the Pelicans.
